tool_description: Analyzes sentiment of review texts and provides sentiment scores, emotional categories, and confidence levels.

review_texts.description: Array of review text content to analyze

error_messages: Empty review text: One or more review texts are empty or contain only whitespace.
Unsupported language: Language code is not supported for sentiment analysis.
Text too long: Individual review text exceeds maximum length of 5000 characters.
Processing error: Unable to process sentiment analysis due to internal error.
usage: Provide an array of review_texts to analyze. Optionally specify language code for better accuracy.

sentiment_scores.description: Array of sentiment scores ranging from -1 (negative) to 1 (positive)

sentiment_labels.description: Array of sentiment labels: positive, negative, or neutral

confidence_scores.description: Array of confidence scores for sentiment predictions (0-1 scale)

emotion_categories.description: Primary emotion detected: joy, anger, sadness, fear, surprise, or neutral
